title: Share of computer science PhDs specializing in artificial intelligence in the US and Canada
subtitle: PhDs who graduated in a given year from academic units of computer science, computer engineering, and information that responded to the Computing Research Association's Taulbee Survey.
sourceDesc: Computing Research Association via AI Index Report (2023)
